item.title: How to Effectively Use AI in Education: A Comprehensive Guide
item.description: AI in education enhances personalized learning, automates tasks like grading, and boosts engagement in online learning. With AI tutors and predictive analytics, students receive tailored support, while educators can improve learning outcomes efficiently.
